ranks.text: After clearing the Bank Palace dungeon in the story, find Makoto in front of the Student Council Office at school. Rank 3 (Scholarly) Knowledge is required. Rnlocks Shadow Calculus ability, allowing you to see the potential drops from enemies on the analyse screen.
Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:Unlocks Baton Pass ability, letting you pass Makoto's turn to other Baton Pass users in battle after a 1 More.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Brainiac Talk ability, giving Makoto the chance to step in and rescue a failed shadow negotiation.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Follow Up ability, giving Makoto the chance to attack an enemy after Joker as a follow-up.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:

options.dialogue: "Only if I can take it seriously."

ranks.text: Requires rank 5 Charm. Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Harisen Recovery ability, which gives Makoto the chance to remove status ailments from party members when in the party.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Shadow Factorization ability, which tells you if an attack will be effective or not while targeting.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Endure ability, giving Makoto a chance to withstand a blow in combat that would usually kill.

options.dialogue: "He says that to all the girls."

ranks.text: This is the point when a romance with Makoto Niijima becomes available. In order to start this rank, you'll need information on the host, Tsukasa. Get this by going to Shinjuku - there's a man outside the bookstore. Talk to him twice. Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Friendship - "You'll find someone someday." +3Romance - "I'll be your study partner."Romance - "I do."Friendship - "That's not what I meant."Unlocks the Protect ability, giving Makoto the ability to shield Joker from an attack that would be fatal.
Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank. Unlocks Second Awakening, evolving Makoto's Persona to its final form, Cybele.

name: Makoto
location: In front of the Student Council Office, or at the school gates.
